titles.title: Providing for the sine die adjournment of the second session of the One Hundred Sixth Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/15/2000--Introduced. Provides for the sine die adjournment of the House of Representatives and the Senate on either December 15, 16, or 17, 2000.
